articles.title: God of War Ragnarok’s ending and why it’s a letdown, explained - Polygon
articles.description: The ending to God of War Ragnarok is suitably intense, with Kratos, Atreus, and Freya storming Asgard. It’s what happens after that disappoints.
articles.content: For a game about a world-ending maelstrom of fire and blood, God of War Ragnarök sure fizzles out. The finale for Santa Monica Studios latest, out now for PlayStation 4 and PlayStation 5, is as satis… [+5842 chars]
